title: The gates in a compound wall shall not open on any public access / pathway / road / street and shall open entirely inside the property
clause_text: The gates in a compound wall shall not open on any public access / pathway / road / street and shall open entirely inside the property.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
